text.mine-lights.about.title: MineLights
text.mine-lights.about.support_intro: If you enjoy this mod, please consider supporting its development:
text.mine-lights.about.kofi: Buy me a coffee on Ko-fi
text.mine-lights.about.description: MineLights is a Minecraft Fabric mod that brings RGB lighting integrations to Minecraft Java Edition.
option.mine-lights.enableMod.tooltip: Toggles all lighting effects from the mod.
option.mine-lights.autoStartServer.toolt:
If enabled, the mod will automatically launch the server
if it's not running. The server EXE must be in the
'MineLights' folder inside your .minecraft directory.
option.mine-lights.refresh_devices.label: Refresh Device List
option.mine-lights.refresh_devices.toolt:
If you plug in a new device while the game is running,
check this and save to make it appear in the list.
option.mine-lights.restart.label: Restart Server
option.mine-lights.restart.tooltip:
If the server process crashes or stops responding,
check this box and save to restart it.
option.mine-lights.restart_admin.label: Restart Server as Administrator
option.mine-lights.restart_admin.tooltip:
Use this if integrations like Mystic Light aren't working.
Requires administrator privileges.
option.mine-lights.device.header: Enable or disable specific lighting devices below:
option.mine-lights.clear_disabled.label: Re-enable All Devices
option.mine-lights.clear_disabled.toolti: Check this box to clear the list of all disabled devices.
option.mine-lights.enableSaturationBar.t:
Shows your food saturation on F9-F12.
Switches to your air level when underwater.
option.mine-lights.enableLocatorBar.tool: Shows the direction of other players or waypoints on 1-0.
option.mine-lights.alwaysShowCompass.too:
If enabled, the compass effect will always show the standard compass
(pointing to world spawn), even if you don't have one.
It will be overridden if you pick up any compass.
option.mine-lights.compassPriority.toolt: Determines which compass to display if multiple types are in your inventory.
option.mine-lights.highlightMovementKeys: Highlights WASD, Sprint, Sneak, and Jump keys.
option.mine-lights.enableBiomeEffects.to: Sets a base keyboard colour based on the biome you are in.
Adds rain and thunderstorm lighting effects.
option.mine-lights.enableInWaterEffect.t: Highlights movement keys with a blue colour when submerged.
minelights.gui.download.title: MineLights Server Required
minelights.gui.download.prompt_missing:
The MineLights.exe file is missing from your mods/MineLights folder. This is required for the mod to work.

Would you like to download it automatically?
minelights.gui.download.prompt_not_runni:
The MineLights Server is not running. This mod needs it to control your RGB devices.

Would you like to download it?
minelights.gui.download.info: Downloading the required MineLights server application.
